value:
$WmMPID_愛の祭エフィ,ch10_06_Efi_F_Valentine20,Face|Here it is, Alm—my gift to you! Bask
in a pile of the best steaks available
on the market!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルム,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|Uh, thanks, Faye. This sure is, ah...
quite the steak pile.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Not to interrupt the festivities, such
as they are, but there's something
important you need to know...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭シルク,ch10_23_Silque_F_Valentine20,Face|Wait, Faye! You and I have yet to
exchange gifts. Please accept this
token of my affection.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エフィ,ch10_06_Efi_F_Valentine20,Face|Oh! I'd almost forgot. Thank you,
Silque. Here's what I've got for you!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭シルク,ch10_23_Silque_F_Valentine20,Face|You're too kind!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭コンラート,ch10_24_Conrad_M_Valentine20,Face|Anthiese! Where are you, Anthiese?
The Day of Devotion isn't complete
until you've received my present!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Please, listen! The Tempest's chaos
rages unabated as we speak! Our
lives are at risk while it continues!$k$p$WmMPID_セリカ,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|Alm, if that's true, we could come
under attack at any moment!$k$p$nMPID_比翼アルム|In the middle of the Day of Devotion?
I won't stand for this. Let's go, Celica!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エフィ,ch10_06_Efi_F_Valentine20,Face|Where Alm goes, I go too!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭シルク,ch10_23_Silque_F_Valentine20,Face|I'm right behind you!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭コンラート,ch10_24_Conrad_M_Valentine20,Face|Me too! Let me just—oh, right, I left
my mask behind, didn't I?$k$pNothing to be done about that,
I suppose. Wait for me, Anthiese!$k$p

$WmMPID_セリカ,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|The Tempest is fading. I think that's
the end of it.$k$p$nMPID_比翼アルム|What an ordeal. We're lucky to come
out of it in one piece.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エフィ,ch10_06_Efi_F_Valentine20,Face|What was that thing?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭シルク,ch10_23_Silque_F_Valentine20,Face|This place is home to all manner of
extraordinary mysteries. Your guess
is as good as mine.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭コンラート,ch10_24_Conrad_M_Valentine20,Face|Whatever it was, let's not allow it to
dampen our festivities any further!
May I have this dance, Anthiese?$k$p$WmMPID_セリカ,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|Well said, dear brother! We should
enjoy this day. I'd be delighted!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エフィ,ch10_06_Efi_F_Valentine20,Face|You must have worked up an appetite
in all that fighting, Alm. Let me get
you some more steak!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルム,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|Uh, sure... Thanks, Faye...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭シルク,ch10_23_Silque_F_Valentine20,Face|Hey, Faye! Let's get back to that
merchant stall we were looking
to visit earlier!$k$p$Fo1000,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|$Fi1000|They're still completely distracted...$k$pAh, well. It worked out in the end,
I suppose.$k$p
